interpretation: The "family: woman, boy, boy" card represents the strong bond and support system that comes with having a close-knit family. This card signifies the importance of family and the role they play in our lives. The woman in the card represents the matriarchal figure who is the backbone of the family, providing love, guidance, and support. The two boys represent the next generation, eager to learn and grow from their family's teachings. This card can also symbolize the importance of unity and teamwork within a family, as well as the power of familial love and protection.
